groups.name: apiml.cloudGateway.registry
groups.description: Cloud Gateway configuration of a service registry endpoint.

properties.name: apiml.security.x509.registry.allowedUsers
properties.description: Specifies the comma-separated list of users that are permitted to use /registry endpoints. The user is obtained from the common name in the provided client certificate.

properties.name: apiml.cloudGateway.registry.enabled
properties.description: Specifies whether the /registry endpoint is enabled.

properties.name: apiml.cloudGateway.registry.metadata-key-allow-list
properties.description: Specifies what custom metadata are displayed in the /registry endpoint.
